author: quark2
body:
#### PR description:
This PR fixes a bug on the part of onlineDQM for GEM. The era is not specified on the run script for GEM onlineDQM, which caused a crash on the GEM onlineDQM in the MWGR #3 (especially run 337234, run 337235). This is a backport version of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31390.

Also, there is a minor change of some status plots; to display bins for good status.

#### PR validation:
Test are done and one can check again by `runTheMatrix` workflows

@jshlee @watson-ij @hyunyong
title: GEM online DQM bug fix - full GE1/1, backport to 11_1_X
